extracted_playbook.title: Review Ivanti's Security Advisory
extracted_playbook.description: Review Ivanti's security advisory for detailed information on the vulnerability and recommended actions.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Affected Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM) to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Review HTTP Access Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Check the http access logs in the `/var/log/httpd/` folder for requests targeting the API endpoint containing `/mifs/asfV3/api/v2/` in the path. Look for HTTP response codes 200, 401, or 403 to identify successful or blocked exploitation attempts.
